outline:
1. load, bearing, tribute, burden, lifting
    1. load, burden
    2. lifting, uplifting, that to which the soul lifts itself up
    3. bearing, carrying
    4. tribute, that which is carried or brought or borne
  2. utterance, oracle, burden Massa = "burden"
  3. a son of Ishmael
kjv_def: burden, carry away, prophecy, [idiom] they set, song, tribute.
strongs_def: a burden; specifically, tribute, or (abstractly) porterage; figuratively, an utterance, chiefly adoom, especially singing; mental, desire
